scripts.predev: bash -lc "export NVM_DIR=\"$HOME/.nvm\"; [ -s \"$NVM_DIR/nvm.sh\" ] && . \"$NVM_DIR/nvm.sh\"; nvm use 22 >/dev/null 2>&1 || true; node -e \"const v=process.versions.node.split('\\.').map(Number); if(v[0]>20 || (v[0]===20 && (v[1]>19 || (v[1]===19 && v[2]>=0)))){console.log('Node OK',process.versions.node);} else {console.error('Node version too old:',process.versions.node); process.exit(1);} \""
scripts.dev: bash -lc 'export NVM_DIR="$HOME/.nvm"; [ -s "$NVM_DIR/nvm.sh" ] && . "$NVM_DIR/nvm.sh"; nvm use 22 >/dev/null 2>&1 || true; echo Using node $(node -v); node ./node_modules/vite/bin/vite.js'
scripts.dev:5173: bash -lc 'export NVM_DIR="$HOME/.nvm"; [ -s "$NVM_DIR/nvm.sh" ] && . "$NVM_DIR/nvm.sh"; nvm use 22 >/dev/null 2>&1 || true; echo Using node $(node -v); PORT=5173 node ./node_modules/vite/bin/vite.js'
scripts.check-node: bash -lc "export NVM_DIR=\"$HOME/.nvm\"; [ -s \"$NVM_DIR/nvm.sh\" ] && . \"$NVM_DIR/nvm.sh\"; nvm use 22 >/dev/null 2>&1 || true; node -e \"const v=process.versions.node.split('\\.').map(Number); if(v[0]>20 || (v[0]===20 && (v[1]>19 || (v[1]===19 && v[2]>=0)))){console.log('Node OK',process.versions.node);} else {console.error('Node version too old:',process.versions.node); process.exit(1);} \""
